item.title: 2.5D pixel art fantasy RPG Spark Ignites announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Will you steal divine power or defy the gods?

Hong Kong-based developer Ignicorvus Studios has announced Spark Ignites, a 2.5D pixel art fantasy RPG in development for PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Spark Ignites is a pixel fantasy RPG where the Star God’s Blessing grants one wish each century. Orphan Ash and Clover uncover its bloody truth during their pilgrimage. Holding a world-changing secret, will you steal divine power or defy the gods? Every choice writes a new ending.

Key Features

  • Immerse in Epic Tales, Brought to Life in 2.5D Pixel Art – Next-generation lighting elevates retro 2.5D pixel art into cinematic medieval masterpieces. From storm-lashed towns to candlelit castles, the glint on knights’ armor to the flicker of tavern hearths—every frame tells a grand saga. Total immersion awaits!
  • Weight of Choice: Shape Your Companions’ Destinies – Every critical decision you make ripples through your companions’ growth, convictions, and ultimate fates. Loyalty, betrayal, redemption… Your choices weave their legends.
  • Demanding Strategy: The New Turn-Based Standard – Forget mindless clicking! Deep class synergy, precise action order, and rich character traits forge intensely challenging and rewarding tactical combat. Every move demands cunning.
  • Fate Intertwined: Pen Your Own Epic – In a crumbling kingdom where ancient evils stir, your choices reshape the world’s fate and the story’s end. Become both witness and architect of legend.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

item.title: SNES – Nintendo Switch Online adds Mario Paint
item.content:encoded:
• Switch
  • Switch 2

Supports Joy-Con 2 controller's mouse functionality.

Mario Paint is now available as part of the Super Nintendo Entertainment System – Nintendo Switch Online lineup, Nintendo announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nintendo:

The 1992 Super Nintendo Entertainment System game turns your system into a canvas, with an array of colors and drawing tools available to create digital works of art. You can even animate your drawings and compose music to craft your own video creations! Get ready to unlock your inner artist using the Joy-Con 2 controller’s mouse functionality on Nintendo Switch 2, or by using a compatible USB mouse (sold separately) on a Nintendo Switch or Nintendo Switch – OLED Model system.

And just like in the original game, you can access the Coloring Book featuring fun designs and character art or play the Gnat Attack training game for some extra mouse control fun.

Brush up on your skills and create your Mario masterpiece!

item.title: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance shipments and digital sales top one million
item.content:encoded:
Total worldwide shipments and digital sales for Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance have surpassed one million units worldwide, ATLUS announced.

The game was last reported to have moved over 500,000 copies within its first three days of release.

ATLUS also announced that total combined shipments and digital sales for both Shin Megami Tensei V and Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance have surpassed two million units, but sales data mistakenly published by ATLUS parent company SEGA had previously already confirmed a combined total of 2.11 million units.

Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on June 14, 2024.
